entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
